<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H6263|עֲתִיד]]</big>**</small>
 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָתֹד‎</span>] **verb** ==be ready== (Late Hebrew adjective <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָתִיד‎</span> ***future*** (as prepared); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be ready, prepared*** (also ***great, bulky***); Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] in derived species and derivatives ); — 

**Pi\`el** ***Imperative*** masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעַתְּדָהּ‎</span> [[Prov.24.27|Prov 24:27]] ***and make it ready*** i. e. thy work (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָכֵן‎</span>).

**Hithpa\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 plural<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְעַתְּדוּ לִגַלִּים‎</span> [[Job.15.28|Job 15:28]] which [houses] ***were prepared*** (destined) ***for*** (i.e. to be) ***heaps*** of ruin.
